name: Applause-SDK
summary: Applause SDK framework for QA and Market mode
description: Applause SDK is a set of tools that closes the feedback loop between app creators, testers and users to help ensure the best app quality possible. With Applause SDK you can stay on top of your app's quality in the lab and in production.
